question: What is the meaning of the Remembrance Day poppy?
possible_answers: A. To remember our Sovereign, Queen Elizabeth II
B. To remember the sacrifice of Canadians who have served or died in wars up to the present day
C. To honor Prime Ministers who have died
main_question: What is the meaning of the Remembrance Day poppy?
answer: B. To remember the sacrifice of Canadians who have served or died in wars up to the present day
explanatory_sentence: Canadians wear the red poppy and observe a moment of silence on Remembrance Day to honour the sacrifices of over a million brave men and women who have served, and the 110,000 who have given their lives.
